title: Converting time to English
description:
Write a program that reads a time in numeric form and prints it in English. The time is input as hours and minutes, separated by a space. Hours are specified in 24-hour time (15 is 3 PM), but the output should be in 12-hour AM/PM form. Note that noon and midnight are special cases.

After each time is input, the user enters "yes" or "no" to indicate if he or she wants to enter another time, you should repeat the process until "no" is entered. You should be able to code this easily using a Do-While statement.
sample_output:
Noon
Midnight
Six forty four AM
Six eleven PM
